overview: Mohammed Bakri's documentary "Jenin, Jenin" is a heart-rending depiction of the aftermath of Israel's destruction of Jenin refugee camp in 2002, where every scene and interview is profound and distressing in equal measure.
tagline: "We will re-build everything on the basis of resistance and Sharon must be aware of the resistance of the Jenin camp for all his life"
title: Jenin, Jenin
